title: Pulling up when your course starts is possible?
content: I feel like I might do better when my course starts and all this 1year physics and Chem stuff isn’t there because I actually have interest in my course and not these so I find it harder to focus. But I don’t know if I’m underestimating the toughness

comments.body: Attendance tho...or else you think any sane person gonna show up to those horrible classes?
